siteMetadata.name: Bryan Morgan
siteMetadata.title: Bryan Morgan | Engineering Manager / ML Engineer
siteMetadata.about: I believe everyone should be passionate about their work, always striving to do better and be better. With my background, I understand the multidimensional aspects of data and development, fostering collaboration and helping drive innovation excellence. As the digital and real worlds become even more closely connected, we need elegant solutions that enhance life...not complicate it. This is the challenge I am focused on solving.
